NewsArticle.Title: Shadows of Temuair Maintenance
NewsArticle.Content:
Shadows of Temauir service is online. Shadows of Temuair service was offline from 11/14 2 a.m. PST through 11/15 5 a.m. PST. We apologize for the inconvenience during this service move.
Shadows of Temuair is the alternative beta server of Dark Ages. Dark Ages service has been online during this time.
